featured.text: Glenn, who retires from the U.S. Senate next month, joins a list of individuals and sports teams honored with more than one ticker-tape parade.
Only John Glenn has received the ticker-tape parade more than once.
Glenn’s first ticker-tape parade on March 1, 1962, after his Mercury flight, is considered the largest ever in New York.
An estimated 3,474 tons of confetti and ticker-tape rained down along a seven-mile route.

definition.zh_def: 顯示股票或其他金融工具的代碼或符號。
definition.en_def: A symbol or code used to uniquely identify a particular stock or financial instrument.
definition.example: The ticker for Apple Inc. is AAPL.
